plays.text: Penalty to Mike Leclerc 2 minutes for Hooking Matt Johnson

Penalty to Keith Carney 2 minutes for Crosschecking Wes Walz
Penalty to Pascal Dupuis 2 minutes for High Sticking Ruslan Salei
